title: Alleviating effects of microplastics together with tetracycline hydrochloride on the physiological stress of Closterium sp.
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00286E, Paper
Yun Kong, Qingyun Zhou, Renjuan Wang , Qi Chen, Xiangyang Xu, Liang Zhu, Yue Wang
Microplastics have significant influences on both freshwater cyanobacteria and marine microalgae, especially co-exposure with other pollutants such as heavy metals, antibiotics, and pharmaceuticals. In the present study, the combined effects...
